extendedInfo.description: You want FlyFrontier.com on the fly? Weâve got you coveredâ¦ with only a few simple swipes and taps. Discover a new way to Fly Frontier with our new Android app. Youâll get quick and easy access to complete travel offerings, right from your Android phone or tablet. Download our FREE app to book tickets, check your flight status, see flight schedules, and even manage your EarlyReturnsÂ® account. Plus, we make it easier to take advantage all our special fare sales and other money-saving offers. Seriously, itâs the perfect download for any travel animal.With the Frontier Android app you can:â¢Book ticketsâ¢Check flight statusâ¢Get flight schedulesâ¢Check inâ¢Manage your EarlyReturnsÂ® accountâ¢Discover special dealsâ¢Receive important travel alertsWhat are you waiting for? Download the app today and see how travelling with Frontier can be easier than ever. Donât just fly, FlyFrontier.com. More Choice. More Perks. More Savings.

reviews.title: Come on, try a little harder.
reviews.comment: Very mediocre. Doesn\'t even remember your last search, or even where your base is. Not even a good attempt at copying their web site which is also mediocre at best.
reviews.author: Ken Rholl

reviews.title: Considerably less than ready for prime timr
reviews.comment: The real value in an airline app is being able to pull up your reservations and check statuses.  Even after logging in the app is unable to find any information of value.  Everything requires knowledge of your confirmation code and its not worth the effort.
reviews.author: Terry Keeney

reviews.title: Terrible app
reviews.comment: Terrible app functionality. Also, what\'s with the carry-on fees and $2 for a Coke? Bad app and an airline that\'s getting worse.
reviews.author: Brendan Dillon

reviews.title: In app check in doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Trying to check-in doesn\'t work. Sent me to a webpage that didnt recognize my flight confirmation #. Does not have digital boarding passes.
reviews.author: Juan Castineiras

reviews.title: Worst airline app I\'ve seen
reviews.comment: The users who are saying this app is just a website are correct.  When I entered my frequent flyer account and password it prompted me \"Do you want the browser to remember this password?\"  Even when logged in you still need to know your confirmation number to get flight status.  It makes their website (which is also nothing to brag about) look like a masterpiece.  Also, it somehow crashed the virtual keyboard on my Samsung phone.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Brent Tucker

reviews.title: Just a web site
reviews.comment: This was a pretty lame attempt at an app. It\'s nothing more than the web site.  It\'s not personalized to the user at all, no mobile boarding pass, etc.
reviews.author: Josh Davids

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: Really? Lets Label a webpage as an App.   Come on folks.. Seriously..  Lets put some creativity with this and make it useful.
reviews.author: Sammy Brence

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: This app is about as useful as a screen door on a submarine. Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Matthew Javernick

reviews.comment: Love Frontier. Hate the app. Its useless on my Bionic. The purpose of a travel app is to provide functionality on the fly (no pun intended.) I just have to get out the laptop to do what I need. Don\'t bother installing.
reviews.author: Chip Clouse

reviews.title: Nothing happens
reviews.comment: I type in my information and hit enter and all of my info disappears and nothing happens.
reviews.author: Dustin Poth

reviews.title: Not even an app!
reviews.comment: It\'s a micro web browser that can only go to the Frontier mobile site which is a pathetic joke.  They must have a REALLY small IT dept - I know pre-teens that write better apps...
reviews.author: Jesse McCoppin

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: This app just connects you to the website. What\'s the point?
reviews.author: Nicole Stone

reviews.title: It still stinks
reviews.comment: No electronic boarding pass (need printer), freezes (once you run through check in, will not leave that last screen, even after killing and restarting the app), slow, settings function does nothing (does not open), app does nothing but give half effort impression of company. Make it better and will update review.
reviews.author: Robert Thegreat

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: An app like this is to be used by frequent flyers but you can\'t view reservations or even check in without first knowing the reservation ID first.  Terrible app.
reviews.author: Dru Petersen

reviews.title: Less functionality than website
reviews.comment: Must have reservation ID even when logged into app. Un-Installing
reviews.author: josh duncan

reviews.title: Fly Frontier App
reviews.comment: Just downloaded on the Samsun Galaxy S3. Working nicely! Didn\'t take me to a website. Frontier rocks! Awesome fares! One of my new choices in airline travel.
reviews.author: Patrick Guadagnino

reviews.comment: it works to book a flight. actually works the exact same as going to there website. but I like not having to open my mobile browser offer this app for sure.
reviews.author: Justin Cram

reviews.title: Like to website
reviews.comment: App is a glorified link to there mobile website
reviews.author: Tristen Robbins
